description: PST_ANSI is an ANSI character set-based data file used by Microsoft Office Outlook 97-2002 to store email messages, calendar events and other items on a local computer. It was replaced by PST_Unicode starting with Office Outlook 2003.
name: Microsoft Outlook 97-2002 Personal Folders File (ANSI)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pst</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
